fixes.name: Net Flow
fixes.solution_explanation: Translated the aggregate expression by replacing the Tableau calculated fields with CALCULATE + SUM on the base Amount column filtered by TransactionType. SUM([Deposit amount]) -> CALCULATE(SUM('accounts+'[Amount]), 'accounts+'[TransactionType] = "Deposit"); SUM([Withdrawal Amount]) -> CALCULATE(SUM('accounts+'[Amount]), 'accounts+'[TransactionType] = "Withdrawal"). All column references use 'table'[column] format.
fixes.type_changed_reason: This calculation uses aggregation (SUM), so it should be created as a measure.
